title: Destructo
description: A small 2D c++ engine with several renderers to switch between, while running.

title: Javascript-Web-Game
description: This is a small JavaScript Web-Development Course Project for IRONHACK. It entails a collection of simple copies of small but well known little games, each as their own level.

title: React-Kanban-Board
description: This is a little kanban-board web-app made with React.js, to be used for planning.
